mapper.select: SELECT PRDT_NO, PRDT_NAME, PRDT_PRICE, PRDT_KCAL, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT FROM PRODUCT_INFO
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT_INFO SET PRDT_NAME = #{prdt_name}, PRDT_PRICE = #{prdt_price}, PRDT_KCAL = #{prdt_kcal}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, CHG_USER_NO = 1, CHG_DT = NOW() WHERE PRDT_NO = #{prdt_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PRODUCT_INFO WHERE PRDT_NO IN #{prdt_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT_INFO WHERE PRDT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{prdt_name}, '%')
